00029 #ifndef RAND_HXX
00030 #define RAND_HXX
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 
00034 #include<stdlib.h>
00035 #include<iostream>
00036 
00037 class Rand {
00038 public:
00039   Rand( istream & in ) { in >> my_x[ 0 ] >> my_x[ 1 ] >> my_x[ 2 ]; }
00040   Rand( unsigned short x[] )
00041    { for ( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i ) my_x[ i ] = x[ i ]; }
00042   operator int() { return nrand48( my_x ); }
00043   int integer( int n ) { return (nrand48( my_x ) % n); }
00044   double real( double lb, double ub )
00045    { return lb + (ub - lb) * erand48( my_x ); }
00046   bool boolean( double r ) { return (erand48( my_x ) < r); }
00047   friend ostream & operator << ( ostream & out, const Rand & R );
00048 private:
00049   unsigned short my_x[ 3 ];
00050 };
00051 
00052 inline ostream & operator << ( ostream & out, const Rand & R )
00053 {
00054   out << R.my_x[0] << " " << R.my_x[1] << " " << R.my_x[2];
00055   return out;
00056 }
00057 
00058 #endif
